Description: Fabric Care refers to the directions to be followed with respect to taking care of the product. It would relate to the washing and drying instructions for customers.
Sample values: hand wash with small amount of mild detergent||wash with like colors||do not bleach||do not dry in direct sunlight||convertible||do not iron on print/embroidery/embellishment||machine wash cold||hand wash/machine wash||hand wash||wash separately||do not wring||tumble dry low||slight shrinkage would be expected||gentle machine wash||do not bleech||machine wash as per tag||wash dark colors separately||machine wash||cold water wash only||wash dark color separately||m/c wash||wrinkle free||do not dry clean||reverse and iron||coated||travel features||gentle wash||cotton-lycra blend||do not tumble dry||reversible||tumble dry medium||slight color may bleed in first wash||denim||reverse and dry||slight color may bleed in all washes||dry in shade||easy wash||normal wash||always wash seapreatly||first wash dry clean thereafter handwash||dry flat||regular machine wash||stain resistant||98% cotton, 2% elastane||do not iron||dry clean only||do not steam iron

Description: Faded refers to the material fade type.
Fit refers to fitting of the clothing that describes how it will fit the wearer's body. Please fill 'NA' if not applicable.
Sample values: slim fit||slim||super skinny||regular fit||skinny||relaxed||regular||tapered fit||skinny fit||boyfriend||boot-leg||flared||tapered||na||jogger fit

Description: Ideal For refers to which gender the product would be most suitable for.
Sample values: women||baby boys & baby girls||girls||baby girls||boys||baby boys||men||boys & girls||men & women

Description: Occasion refers to the type of event that the product is ideally suited for. This is a Multi-Text attribute, that is, multiple options can be chosen. Please avoid combinations like Casual::Formal, Formal::Sports, Sports::Ethnic, Sports::Wedding, as these will not make any sense for the customer.
Suitable for refers to the categorization of the product based on its usage and occasion.
Ornamentation Type refers to the decorative elements added to the product to enhance its appearance and make it more attractive
Sample values: cuffed hems||frayed hems||fringes||tassels||sequins||patchwork||raw hems||turn up||none||glitter||pom pom||stones||pearl||pocket flap||statement logo||ruffle||stitching details||typography||eyelets||carabiner||side strip

Description: Pleats refers to the type of pleats that the product comes with.
Pocket Type refers to the type of pocket/pockets available on the product.
